title: LVLING UP :(
body: What is the fastest way to get to LVL 30 ?

replies.body: Fastest way I know of is 7 minute TT games VS AI using time based *and* win based XP bosts, 300-400+ XP per game. You need 2 other people though and be willing to put in some money for RP.

if it's your first time (ie you aren't smurfing) just play games. trust me, you really need the experience before getting into ranked, or you will hate every second of it.

Exp boosts are a thing, but unless you've got cash to spare they're not really worth it. other than that just play norms - they give the most exp and also help you learn the game more than just playing bots.

Also, i've got a level 15 account that i've been trying to level up so we could play together if you want :p
would love to play ! ill add you :)
